hero.subtitle: Track your child's vaccination journey. Automated voice reminders so you never miss an appointment. For parents — simple, private, no institution required.

features.title: Everything You Need to
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools designed for busy parents who care about their children's health
features.item0Desc: Automated schedule aligned with national guidelines. Never manually calculate vaccine dates again.
features.item1Desc: Automatic calls when a dose is due. Reminders that fit your schedule.
features.item2Desc: Track your first child free. Add more children with a paid plan — one account for the whole family.

howItWorks.title: Get Started in
howItWorks.subtitle: Setting up your family's vaccination tracking is quick and easy
howItWorks.step0Desc: Sign up in seconds and add your children's information securely.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Choose how you want to be notified — voice, SMS, or email.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Monitor your child's vaccination journey and never miss a dose.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Keep your family healthy with complete immunization coverage.

testimonials.title: Trusted by
testimonials.subtitle: See what parents are saying about jelba.ma
testimonials.text0: jelba.ma has been a lifesaver! I never worry about missing my children's vaccination appointments anymore. The voice reminders are so helpful.
testimonials.text1: Managing vaccinations for three kids was overwhelming. jelba.ma made it simple and stress-free. Highly recommended for all parents!
testimonials.text2: The automated tracking is brilliant. I love that everything is in one place and so easy to access.

footer.tagline: Protecting Morocco's children, one vaccination at a time. Your trusted partner in your family's immunization journey.

signin.welcomeDesc: Sign in to continue tracking your children's vaccination journey and stay on schedule.
signin.secureDesc: Your data is encrypted and protected. We never share your personal or health information with third parties.
